rationale: Auth forms use custom inline focus styles (focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 or focus:ring-amber-500) that don't match the design system's Input component. This creates visual inconsistency and maintenance burden.
problemSolved: Auth forms use raw <input> elements with custom Tailwind classes like 'bg-zinc-800 border border-zinc-700 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-amber-500' instead of the standard Input component
